de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.overview

Class AbstractOverviewController<T extends TitledIDTypeModel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.overview.AbstractOverviewController<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICRUDActionsController, IEditDialogCRUDActionsController<T>, IDetailsController<T>, IOverviewController<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OverviewClubsController, OverviewLeagueGamesController, OverviewOtherEventsController, OverviewPeopleController, OverviewRefereesController, OverviewTournamentsController, OverviewTraineesController

    public abstract class AbstractOverviewController<T extends TitledIDTypeModel>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEditDialogCRUDActionsController<T>, IDetailsController<T>, IOverviewController<T>

    Abstract controller for overview scenes.

      • showEditDialog

        public boolean showEditDialog(T theData)
        Description copied from interface: IEditDialogCRUDActionsController

        Opens the data edit dialog.

        If the user clicks OK, the changes are saved into the provided event object and true is returned.

        Specified by:
        showEditDialog in interface IEditDialogCRUDActionsController<T extends TitledIDTypeModel>
        Parameters:
        theData - the data to be edited
        Returns:
        true if the user clicked OK, false otherwise.
